name: trapped (itch) (starzonmyarmz)
description:
Important: This game is designed to be played on a mobile device, and requires permission to use it's motion sensors.

Because of how Itch embeds work, some mobile devices (such as iPhones) are unable to grant access. To work around this limitation, this game is also hosted on GitHub Pages. If you experience difficulty getting the game to work on Itch, please try playing the game published on GitHub: https://starzonmyarmz.github.io/trapped/.

Created for the #GitHubGameOff 2021. A survival game about a fly trying to survive after mysteriously being sucked into a phone. Tilt your phone to move the fly around to avoid colliding with the various shapes on screen.

This game features a minimalistic atmosphere and artwork, combined with originally composed/performed music.

Built using HTML, CSS, and JS on top of the p5.js framework, as well as some p5.js plugins. Check out the source code if that tickles your fancy.

If you like the music, check out the soundtrack!
